translation.en: [woman] Christmas is almost here.
And after that day, I know my life will never be the same.
translation.it: E dopo quel giorno, la mia vita cambierà per sempre.

translation.en: I'm a little scared.
Well, to be honest, a lot scared.
translation.it: Beh, a dire il vero, ho molta paura.

translation.en: What will happen to me, to us?
translation.it: Che ne sarà di me, di noi?

translation.en: And then there's little Jacob.
translation.it: E poi c'è il piccolo Jacob.

translation.en: What about him?
I just hope he'll be okay.
translation.it: Spero davvero che se la cavi.

translation.en: -[fan] There he is! -[crowd cheering]
How's everybody doing? See you in there. Thanks for coming.
translation.it: Come state? Ci vediamo dentro. Grazie di essere venuti.

translation.en: In Book Five, will we finally learn the truth about Camille?
translation.it: Nel quinto libro, finalmente scopriremo la verità su Camille?

translation.en: Is she part of the French Resistance like she says?
translation.it: Fa parte della Resistenza francese, come dice?

translation.en: Or is she really a Nazi spy? You know, I've been going back and forth on that one.
translation.it: - Oppure è una spia nazista? - Sono molto indeciso su questo punto.

translation.en: [gasps] Make her a heroine! Oh, it's so much more romantic.
translation.it: Falla diventare un'eroina. Sarebbe molto più romantico.

translation.en: -Yeah… -Then again, a spy is sexier.
translation.it: Però una spia è più intrigante.

translation.en: Hmm! You know what? -[whispers] Double agent. -[fan exclaims]
translation.it: O magari potrebbe fare il doppio gioco.

translation.en: Could you inscribe it to Sherri, please? I'm Sherri.
translation.it: Può dedicarlo a Sherri, per favore? Sono io Sherri.

translation.en: So is it an "I" or a "Y"?
Either is fine.
You recognize me, non? Book Three.
translation.it: Mi riconosci, non? Il terzo libro.

translation.en: [in French] Of course, of course! Camille Toussaint. How are you?
translation.it: Mais oui! Camille Toussaint! - Comment allez-vous? - Très bien, monsieur. Très bien.

translation.en: Very well, sir. Very well.
translation.it: - Comment allez-vous? - Très bien, monsieur. Très bien.

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Camille.
Thank you so much!
[in English] Make it out to Todd and Mark. Sure.
translation.it: - Puoi dedicarlo a Todd e Mark? - Certo.

translation.en: Oh, make that Mark and Todd. I read the book first.
translation.it: Anzi a Mark e Todd. Ho letto prima io il libro.

translation.en: [Todd] No way. Don't you remember? Your sister gave it to me.
translation.it: Ricordi? Me l'ha dato tua sorella.

translation.en: -No, your sister gave it to me-- -[Jacob] Tell you what, fellas.
translation.it: - No, tua sorella l'ha dato a me… - Sapete che c'è?

translation.en: You know what I'm gonna do? I'm gonna go ahead and sign two books. One for each of you, okay?
translation.it: Ne firmo due di libri, uno per uno. Va bene?

translation.en: My treat. There you go.
So, are you staying in the city for the holidays?
translation.it: Ti fermi un po' qui per le vacanze?

translation.en: I'm afraid not. -Gotta get home to my girl, Ava. -Oh.
translation.it: Temo di no. Devo tornare a casa dalla mia Ava.

translation.en: I didn't know that you were…
Well, she's a very lucky woman.
translation.it: Beh, è una donna molto fortunata.

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -Merry Christmas.
Ava, hon, I'm home!
-[whines and barks] -Come here! Come here, baby. What's up? How are you? Come here! Hi! Hi!
translation.it: Vieni qua! Vieni qui, bella. Come va? Come stai? Vieni qua! Ma ciao!

translation.en: -Welcome home, Mr. Jacob. -Oh, thanks, Svet. Thanks.
[Jacob] Hi, how are you? Hello!
-Everything under control? Yeah? -Mmm-hmm.
-Yeah. Refrigerator is full. Ava has bath. -Yeah. Okay.
translation.it: - Il frigo è pieno. Ava ha fatto il bagno. - Sì, bene.

translation.en: I bring in extra firewood.
Oh, and, uh, fan mail.
[laughs] More even than last book, I think.
Wow. Okay, fan mail. Look at that.
Now I know what I'm doing for the next couple weeks, right?
translation.it: - So cosa fare le prossime settimane. - Già.

translation.en: Thank you for holding down the fort while I was gone.
translation.it: Grazie di aver badato alla casa mentre ero via.

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -Oh, I almost forgot.
-This, Svetlana, is for you. -Oh!
Happy holidays.
-And, you know, thank you for everything. -Oh, thank you.
You're gonna be okay, Mr. Jacob?
Okay? Yeah, what do you mean? It's me. Of course. I'm always okay.
translation.it: Bene? Che vuoi dire? Sono io, sto sempre bene.

translation.en: But also always alone.
I'm alone because I prefer it that way, you know that. Besides, I'm not alone.
translation.it: Sto da solo perché preferisco così. E poi, ho qui la mia amica, Ava. Mi terrà compagnia.

translation.en: I got my best girl here, Ava. She'll keep me company.
translation.it: E poi, ho qui la mia amica, Ava. Mi terrà compagnia.

translation.en: -See you next year, Mr. Jacob. -Yeah! See you, you know…
translation.it: - Ci vediamo l'anno prossimo, sig. Jacob. - Sì. Ci vediamo…

translation.en: Ava! [clicks tongue] Come here.
Let's, uh, see what we got here.
-[jazz music playing on radio] -Ah, there we go. All right.
I could get down with that. That's good. That is good.
-Hello? -[man] Hi, is this, uh, Jacob Turner?
Yeah, this is,
but, you know, I don't need my carpets cleaned, or a home loan, or--
translation.it: ma non voglio far pulire la moquette, né un mutuo per la casa…

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, Mr. Turner, apologies. I was, uh… hesitant to leave a message.
translation.it: Sì, mi scusi, sig. Turner. Non volevo lasciarle un messaggio.

translation.en: My name is Matt Segreto. I'm an attorney--
translation.it: Mi chiamo Matt Segreto. Sono un avvocato…

translation.en: Oh, let me guess. You have a client who claims I stole one of their ideas.
translation.it: Ha un cliente che dice che gli ho rubato un'idea.

translation.en: No, um…
I'm the executor of your mother's estate.
translation.it: Sono l'esecutore testamentario di sua madre.

translation.en: I'm sorry. You're, uh… What was that?
translation.it: Mi scusi? Che cosa ha detto?

translation.en: I really am sorry to be the one to tell you. Uh…
She passed last week.
I thought you knew.
No, I… I didn't know that.
[Jacob] My mother and I hadn't spoken in a long time.
translation.it: Io e mia madre non ci parlavamo da molto tempo.

translation.en: Our relationship was, uh…
complicated.
[Matt on phone] I understand.
She left everything to you, um, her house and all her furnishings.
translation.it: Le ha lasciato tutto, casa e mobili compresi.

translation.en: There's some paperwork that needs to be signed.
translation.it: Ci sarebbero dei documenti da firmare.

translation.en: Um, I can arrange to meet you in Bridgeport one day next week, if that's convenient.
translation.it: Possiamo vederci a Bridgeport la settimana prossima, se le va bene.

translation.en: -[Matt] Mr. Turner. -Hey!
-Thanks for meeting me out here. -Yeah.
-I'm so sorry for your loss. -Thank you.
Place must bring back a lot of memories.
translation.it: La casa le ricorderà tante cose.

translation.en: You have no idea.
-[Jacob] You just, uh… -Yeah.
[Jacob] Careful.
Whoa.
Yeah, neighbors said she rarely left the house. And when they dropped by, she never let them in.
translation.it: Secondo i vicini non usciva mai. Quando passavano, non li faceva entrare.

translation.en: Now I know why.
Should be a piano hiding over here somewhere.
translation.it: Dovrebbe esserci un pianoforte nascosto da qualche parte.

translation.en: Um, yep. According to the inventory, it's a Steinway Model S, 1940.
translation.it: Sì. Secondo l'inventario, è uno Steinway modello S del 1940.

translation.en: It's worth about 40 grand.
From the look of things, you're gonna be doing a lot of trash runs.
translation.it: Mi sembra che ci sia un bel po' di roba da buttare.

translation.en: Do you want me to get a dumpster rental for you?
translation.it: Vuole che le noleggi un cassonetto?

translation.en: Oh, uh… Yeah. -Thanks. -Yeah.
And, um, Mr. Turner…
Jake. [chuckles]
I hate to bother you, but my wife is just a huge fan, and, um…
translation.it: Mi scoccia infastidirla, ma mia moglie è una sua ammiratrice…

translation.en: Okay. [clears throat]
You know, us Regular Joes can never really live up to the super-suave dudes in your books. [laughs]
translation.it: Noi uomini comuni non saremo mai all'altezza dei suoi personaggi.

translation.en: Those dudes aren't real, Matt.
Yeah, tell that to my wife.
translation.it: Sì, vada a dirlo a mia moglie.

translation.en: Her name's Mercedes.
Like the car.
[chuckles] Right.
-Here you go. -Thank you.
Come on, babe.
All right, you ready? Hop on up.
Good girl.
Simply exquisite.
Ellie, is that you?
Jacob, you came!
Of course.
I don't know, somehow I assumed that you'd send an assistant or someone,
translation.it: Non so, pensavo avresti mandato un assistente o qualcun altro,

translation.en: I guess because you're so famous now.
No, some things you gotta do on your own. So good to see you. You look great.
translation.it: Certe cose si fanno da soli. Che bello vederti, stai d'incanto.

translation.en: You too. It's been a long time. What, it's 20 years, probably?
translation.it: Anche tu. È passato tanto tempo. Forse vent'anni.

translation.en: -You were about 18 when you left. -17 when I left.
translation.it: - Avevi 18 anni quando te ne sei andato. - Ne avevo 17.

translation.en: [Ellie] That was a really tough time for you.
[Jacob] Yeah, it was.
But, you know, I always knew you'd be a writer.
You were an interesting kid.
You had a wonderful imagination, and you loved words.
translation.it: Avevi una bella immaginazione e ti piacevano le parole.

translation.en: I remember sitting in your den for hours, playing online Scrabble.
translation.it: Ricordo le ore passate a giocare a Scarabeo in salotto da te.

translation.en: Oh, whenever your mom had a really bad day.
translation.it: Quando tua madre aveva una giornataccia.

translation.en: Mom had a lot of bad days, didn't she? She was never the same.
translation.it: - Mamma ne ha avute parecchie, vero? - Non è più stata la stessa.

translation.en: [Jacob] None of us were.
-They're good! -[Ellie laughs]
-Oh, wonderful. -[Jacob] That's sweet. Thank you.
-[Ellie] Bye-bye now. -Bye.
Hey, are you still painting?
You might as well ask if I'm still breathing.
Listen, I'm glad I ran into you. It's good to see you.
I'm about ready to take off. I gotta, um…
I gotta come back tomorrow and tackle another room.
It's gotta be really, really hard going through all her stuff.
translation.it: Dev'essere davvero dura vedere tutte le sue cose.

translation.en: Yeah. What was it that Robert Frost always said?
translation.it: Già. Cosa diceva sempre Robert Frost?

translation.en: He said, "The best way out is always through," right?
Although I'm pretty sure he never met a hoarder.
translation.it: Sono sicuro che non abbia mai incontrato un accumulatore.

translation.en: I would imagine not.
[Jacob] It's lonely out here.
And I miss you.
Oh, God! Oh, come on!
Oh, come on, Mom, really?
-What? -[Ava whines]
Still like a grilled cheese with tomato soup?
translation.it: Zuppa di pomodoro e toast al formaggio come una volta?

translation.en: I figured you'd probably worked up a pretty good appetite by now.
translation.it: Ho pensato che ti potesse essere venuta fame.

translation.en: You kidding? I'm starving.
-Does she like tomato soup? Is this okay? -She loves it. Yeah. Yeah, it's great.
translation.it: - Le piace la zuppa? Posso dargliela? - Certo, fai pure.

translation.en: [Ellie] Oh, there you go.
-Oh, she does! -Look at that!
We don't know how to thank you. Do we, Ava?
translation.it: Non sappiamo come ringraziarti. Vero, Ava?

translation.en: -You could put me in your next novel. -Whoa, whoa, hold on a second.
translation.it: Mettimi in un libro. Scusa, ma davvero hai letto i miei libri?

translation.en: You actually read my novels?
translation.it: Scusa, ma davvero hai letto i miei libri?

translation.en: I'm probably the only one of your readers who can recognize some of the characters.
translation.it: Forse sono l'unica che riesce a riconoscere qualche personaggio.

translation.en: Like whom, for instance?
-Well, in Green Eyes. -Green Eyes of Paris.
translation.it: - Beh, in Occhi verdi… - Occhi verdi a Parigi.

translation.en: Yeah, the photographer.
Beautiful, strong woman who has a breakdown.
translation.it: Una donna bella e forte che ha un esaurimento.

translation.en: Well, that one's pretty obvious, though, right?
There's another character I recognize, you know, in The Final Midnight.
translation.it: Ce n'è un altro che ho riconosciuto ne L'ultima mezzanotte.

translation.en: The father of the soldier.
Very minor character, though. Sort of like in real life.
translation.it: Un personaggio secondario. Come nella vita vera.

translation.en: Your memories of him can't be all that bad if you're still wearing his watch.
translation.it: Non avrai ricordi brutti di lui se indossi il suo orologio.

translation.en: He came to your mother's funeral. Did you know that?
translation.it: È venuto al funerale di tua madre. Lo sapevi?

translation.en: To pay his respects, but I'm pretty sure he was hoping to see you there.
translation.it: Per darle l'ultimo saluto, ma forse sperava di vederti.

translation.en: No, I don't…
I don't think so, no.
And the funeral… the funeral, I feel…
It's understandable, but it doesn't matter anymore.
translation.it: È comprensibile, ma non ha più importanza.

translation.en: That was then. This is now.
translation.it: È andata così. Adesso siamo qui.

translation.en: Thanks.
-[Ellie] And can I ask you a question? -Yeah.
-It's personal. -Sure.
Am I too old for this?
[Jake laughs] Are-- -This is your question? -Yes.
translation.it: - Sei… È questa la domanda? - Sì.

translation.en: No! No.
-Seriously? -This is perfect.
Have you tried one of these? Of course not. Why would you?
translation.it: Hai mai provato? Certo che no, perché dovresti?

translation.en: You got women linin' up on your doorstep.
translation.it: Avrai la fila davanti alla porta.

translation.en: [laughing] I do not have women lining up on my doorstep.
translation.it: Non ho la fila davanti alla porta.

translation.en: I see those magazines at the supermarket. You date movie stars.
translation.it: Vedo i giornaletti al supermercato. Esci con le star.

translation.en: [laughing] All right. Listen, they will print anything.
But the answer to your question, no, I have not tried a dating app,
translation.it: No, non ho provato le app d'incontri,

translation.en: but I think you absolutely should.
I have to write something.
-Dating profile? -Yeah.
I know a writer. May I?
-You're gonna write my profile? Oh! -It would be my pleasure.
translation.it: - Mi scrivi il profilo? - Sarebbe un piacere.

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Come on in, Ellie. Door's open.
translation.it: Entra, Ellie. La porta è aperta.

translation.en: -Hello? -You're not Ellie.
Uh, no. No, I'm not.
No, it's just-- I thought you were my neighbor. Oh, sorry.
translation.it: - No, pensavo fossi la vicina di casa. - Scusa.

translation.en: You were here before, right? -You were across the street? -Yeah. Yeah, that was me.
translation.it: - Ti ho già visto, di là dalla strada? - Sì. Ero io.

translation.en: I'm not some kind of weird stalker or anything, if that's what you're thinking.
translation.it: Non sono una stalker malintenzionata, se è questo che pensi.

translation.en: No, I didn't think you were. Could you close the door behind you?
translation.it: Non lo penso proprio. Puoi chiudere la porta?

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Yeah, of course. Yeah, um…
What can I do for you? -[Ava whines] -Hey. He's cute. Good boy.
translation.it: - Che posso fare per te? - Ehi, che carino. Sei un bel cagnolino.

translation.en: Girl, actually. That's Ava.
translation.it: Veramente è una lei. Si chiama Ava.

translation.en: -Cool name. Hey, Ava. -[whines]
This is the Turner residence, right?
[sighs] Sort of. Sort of. Uh, I'm Jake Turner.
translation.it: Più o meno. Sono Jake Turner.

translation.en: Great. Nice to meet you, Mr. Turner.
My name's Rachel Campbell. And the reason I'm here…
translation.it: Mi chiamo Rachel Campbell. Sono qui perché…

translation.en: Sorry, this is a little complicated, but I'm trying to find my mother.
translation.it: Scusa, è un po' complicato, ma sto cercando mia madre.

translation.en: And I think you might be able to help me.
translation.it: E credo che tu possa aiutarmi.

translation.en: She used to live here a long time ago, I think. I hope.
translation.it: Tanto tempo fa viveva qui, credo. Spero.

translation.en: Your mother lived here in this house?
Yeah, um, when I was born… Rather, right before I was born, she lived…
translation.it: Sì, quando sono nata. Cioè, proprio prima che nascessi.

translation.en: This is Scott and Lois Turner's house, right?
translation.it: È la casa di Scott e Lois Turner?

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, well, yeah. My parents.
translation.it: Sì. Sì, sono i miei genitori.

translation.en: Great. So, yeah, my birth mother, she lived here and she worked for them.
translation.it: La mia madre biologica viveva qui e lavorava per loro.

translation.en: Your mother worked for my parents?
From what I can tell, she was actually their nanny.
translation.it: Da quello che so, in realtà faceva la tata.

translation.en: Whoa! No! Oh, whoa, whoa! No, no, no! Okay, hold on! Hold--
Ow! That's hot.
You need a hand? [chuckling] No, no, it's… -I got it under control. -Okay.
translation.it: - Serve una mano? - No, ho tutto sotto controllo.

translation.en: -[Jacob] Ah, forget it. -Okay.
So what brings Nancy Drew to the Turner house, anyway?
translation.it: Che ci fa la detective Nancy Drew a casa Turner?

translation.en: -If you don't mind me asking. -[laughs]
It wasn't easy. My adoption file was sealed.
But a friend of mine worked for the Connecticut Records Department.
translation.it: Ho un amico all'Archivio del Connecticut.

translation.en: By law, he couldn't tell me my mom's name, but he could tell me her last known address which was here, so…
translation.it: Per legge, non può darmi il nome, ma l'ultimo indirizzo sì, questo.

translation.en: I understand, but I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I…
I was just about ready to head out. I wish I could help you.
-I don't think I can, though. -No, I totally understand.
translation.it: - Ma non credo di farcela. - Capisco.

translation.en: I guess I just gotta learn to leave the table.
translation.it: Devo solo imparare… "ad alzarmi da tavola".

translation.en: Nina Simone.
That's right. Yeah, she's the best.
translation.it: Esatto. Sì, era la più brava.

translation.en: -One of your favorites? -She is.
-You got any others? -Uh, Peggy Lee, Ella, Lady Day.
translation.it: - Ne hai altre? - Peggy Lee, Ella, Lady Day.

translation.en: -Aretha. -Mmm. Oh, don't forget about Gladys.
[laughs] Oh, Gladys the Baddest. My dad…
translation.it: Gladys è la più tosta. Mio padre…

translation.en: He was my own personal musicologist, taught me everybody.
translation.it: era il mio musicologo, mi ha insegnato tutto.

translation.en: Like Little Richard, Marvin Gaye.
-Marvin. We lost him when I was a kid. -'84.
translation.it: - È morto quando ero piccolo. - Nel 1984.

translation.en: -Yeah. Yep. -You in music or something?
translation.it: Già. - Sei per caso un musicista? - No, sono…

translation.en: No. No, no, I'm a…
translation.it: - Sei per caso un musicista? - No, sono…

translation.en: -I write a little bit. -Really? Cool! Anything I know?
translation.it: - Scrivo. - Davvero? Forte, qualcosa che conosco?

translation.en: Uh… You know, no, probably not.
-No? Anything I'd like? -No. No, probably not. [laughs]
translation.it: - No? Magari mi può piacere? - No, probabilmente no.

translation.en: -Struggling artist? I get it. -Ah…
Well, I guess we're all struggling in one way or another, huh?
translation.it: Siamo tutti in difficoltà in qualche modo, no?

translation.en: Ain't that the truth.
Listen, I'm sorry I couldn't help you with your mom. Yeah. Don't apologize.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace di non averti aiutato. - Sì, non scusarti.

translation.en: Honestly, just being in the house where she once lived makes me feel…
translation.it: Il solo fatto di essere nella casa in cui viveva…

translation.en: I don't know… [sighs] …more connected to her somehow.
translation.it: mi fa sentire più vicina a lei.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
Anyway, thanks.
-Um, thank you. Yeah. -Oh.
Oops. [laughs] Merry Christmas.
-Merry Christmas to you. -Thank you.
-[Jacob] Wait, Ellie. Wait-- Rachel! -[car driving off]
Rachel, wait!
I have an idea.
Thing is, my neighbor's been living here for years, and I was thinking she…
translation.it: La mia vicina vive qui da anni. Magari lei…

translation.en: [Ellie chuckling] I feel the same way.
Well, that was quick.
[Rachel] What?
Uh, nothing. I'll explain later.
Listen, why don't I, um, give you my phone number? And then you can just text me tomorrow.
translation.it: Va bene se ti do il mio numero e poi ci sentiamo domani?

translation.en: -I'm sure I'll have spoken to her by then. -Oh, that would be great.
translation.it: - Per allora le avrò parlato. - Ottimo.

translation.en: Actually, you know what? Um… I think I might just wait until she's back.
translation.it: A dire il vero, penso che aspetterò che torni.

translation.en: -I'll wait in my car. -You sure? She might be a while.
translation.it: - Aspetto in macchina. - Ci vorrà un po'.

translation.en: -I've come this far, so… -Okay.
translation.it: - Sono arrivata fino a qui, per cui… - Ok.

translation.en: -Okay. -Yup.
Thanks.
-Hey. -Hey.
What's up?
Are you hungry? I was gonna grab a bite, if you're hungry.
translation.it: Hai fame? Stavo andando a mangiare qualcosa, se hai fame.

translation.en: -[Rachel] Very cool. -Mmm-hmm. -So is this an old haunt or… -No.
translation.it: Molto bello. Ci vieni spesso oppure…

translation.en: I haven't been here in years, actually,
translation.it: No, non ci vengo da anni,

translation.en: but my mom used to take me here a lot when I was a kid.
translation.it: ma mia madre mi ci portava sempre da piccolo.

translation.en: -She loved this place. -I can see why. It's nice.
translation.it: - Lo adorava. - La capisco bene, è un bel posto.

translation.en: -Welcome to Trattoria Toscana. -Thank you.
I am Vittorio. May I share tonight's specials?
translation.it: Sono Vittorio. Vi dico cosa c'è oggi?

translation.en: [in English] Could you repeat in English?
translation.it: Può ripetere i piatti in inglese?

translation.en: No, no, it's… it's fine. I'll just have whatever she's having.
translation.it: Non c'è problema. Prendo quello che ha preso lei.

translation.en: -Ah. -Oh, and a glass of wine, please.
-Do you want one? -Uh, no, no.
You sure?
-[in English] What's that last thing? -Oh, it's, um…
translation.it: - Cos'era l'ultima cosa che hai ordinato? - Niente.

translation.en: -Separate checks. Yeah. -Separate checks?
You're a writer and I just want to respect that.
translation.it: Sei uno scrittore e voglio rispettarlo.

translation.en: Both of my parents are artists. They make and sell their own jewelry.
translation.it: I miei genitori sono artisti. Fanno e vendono gioielli.

translation.en: So as you can imagine, it's, uh…
translation.it: Come puoi immaginare, non è stato sempre facile arrivare a fine mese.

translation.en: there have been times when the bills have been challenging.
translation.it: non è stato sempre facile arrivare a fine mese.

translation.en: So I figure it's better to--
I'm sure you can understand and appreciate that sometimes it's--
translation.it: Credo tu possa comprendere e capire che a volte…

translation.en: -Thank you. I appreciate it. Nice of you. -Yeah. Yeah, of course.
translation.it: - Ti ringrazio, apprezzo. Sei gentile. - Certo, nessun problema.

translation.en: So you speak fluent Italian. How'd that happen?
Well, actually, I also speak French and German.
translation.it: Beh, in realtà, parlo anche francese e tedesco,

translation.en: Little bit of Mandarin.
-You speak a little Mandarin? -A bit.
[in Mandarin] I kid you not!

I'll never, ever forget you.

Like the rest of us, yeah.

you're welcome.
